channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13821] OrcSplit groups all delta files together into a single split
item.description: HIVE-7428 had fix for worst case column projection size estimate. It was removed in HIVE-10397 to return file length but for ACID strategy file length is passed as 0. In worst case, this always return 0 and all files ends up in single split.
item.summary: OrcSplit groups all delta files together into a single split

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: ekoifman This patch reverts the changes that were removed from HIVE-7428. Can you please review?
is it feasible to add a test for this?
ekoifman Added a unit test.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
